title: Der Oktober war in Tirol ein trockener Monat

de: Der Oktober war in Tirol ein trockener Monat. Der Oktober war in Tirol relativ niederschlagsarm. Die Temperaturen wie auch die Sonnenscheindauer lagen im Durchschnitt leicht unter den langjährigen Mittelwerten. Die Daten der GeoSphere Austria zeigen noch einige weitere Details.
en: October was a dry month in Tyrol. October had relatively little precipitation in Tyrol. On average, the temperatures and the duration of sunshine were slightly below the long-term averages. The data from GeoSphere Austria shows a few more details.
la: October mensis in Tyrolis siccus erat. Octobris relative parum praecipitatio in Tyrol habuit. Mediocris, temperaturas et solis durationes paulo infra averages longum tempus erant. Notitia ex GeoSphere Austria pauca plura demonstrat.

title: Neues Glashaus für Botanikzentrum

en: New glasshouse for botany center. The Carinthian Botany Center in the Botanical Garden in Klagenfurt has a new glass house. The old one already had serious defects, which had already taken a toll on the heat-loving plants. The new glass house for 530,000 euros now has two climate zones...
la: Novum vitreum botanicis centrum. Carinthianum Botany Centrum in horto botanico in Klagenfurt novam domum vitream habet. Senex iam gravia vitia habuit, quae iam portorium plantis amantibus caloris ceperat. Nova domus vitrea pro 530,000 nummis Europaeis nunc duas zonas climatis habet.

en: Caught in the snowstorm: How a ski tourer suddenly fought for his life in the Alps. Tommaso Piccioli says he experienced hell - in the snowstorm when his group got lost. Seven people died. He survived. What saved him?
la: Captus in nivis: Quam subito ski tourer pro vita sua in Alpibus pugnavit. Tommaso Piccioli dicit se infernum expertum esse - in nivis cum caterva sua amissa est. Septem homines mortui sunt. Vixit. Quid eum servavit?

la: Sic plantae tuae per frigus evadunt: 5 in horto ante initium hiemis res certe facere debes. Venturus hiemis impetum facit quidam hortus amantium timidus. Multum res est considerare curare ut hortus tuus amanter conservatus bene per frigora recipiat. Dicemus quae quinque res magnae sunt.

title: Danach folgt Wolken-Nebel-Mix: November verschafft uns Nachschlag mit sonnigem Herbstwetter
description: Nach dem grauen Oktober geht es in weiten Teilen Deutschlands derzeit schön zu: Sonne und angenehme Temperaturen an vielen Orten. Doch in der Zukunft verdichten sich bereits die Anzeichen für einen Wintereinbruch, erklärt ntv-Meterologe Björn Alexander.
content: Nach dem grauen Oktober geht es in weiten Teilen Deutschlands derzeit schön zu: Sonne und angenehme Temperaturen an vielen Orten. Doch in der Zukunft verdichten sich bereits die Anzeichen für einen W… [+4640 chars]
de: Danach folgt Wolken-Nebel-Mix: November verschafft uns Nachschlag mit sonnigem Herbstwetter. Nach dem grauen Oktober geht es in weiten Teilen Deutschlands derzeit schön zu: Sonne und angenehme Temperaturen an vielen Orten. Doch in der Zukunft verdichten sich bereits die Anzeichen für einen Wintereinbruch, erklärt ntv-Meterologe Björn Alexander.
en: This is followed by a mix of clouds and fog: November gives us a helping hand with sunny autumn weather. After the gray October, things are currently looking good in many parts of Germany: sunshine and pleasant temperatures in many places. But in the future there are already increasing signs of an onset of winter, explains ntv meteorologist Björn Alexander.
la: Misce sequitur nebulas et nebulas: November nobis dat manum aprici autumni tempestatem. Post griseo Octobri, res in multis partibus Germaniae nunc bonae spectant: soles et temperaturas amoenas in multis locis. Sed in futurum iam aucta signa accessionis hiemis explicat ntv astrologus Björn Alexander.

de: Polarluft aus Nordwest: Wintereinbruch in Sicht – Live-Karten zeigen, wo es rutschig wird. Das Wetter wird winterlicher. Ab Mitte dieser Woche soll es mehr schneien, und es kann auf den Straßen glatt werden. Unsere Live-Karten zeigen die Lage in Ihrer Region.
en: Polar air from the northwest: onset of winter in sight – live maps show where it will be slippery. The weather is becoming more wintry. There will be more snow from the middle of this week and the roads may become slippery. Our live maps show the situation in your region.
la: Aer polaris ab occidente septentrione: impetus hiemis in aspectu – tabulae vivae ostendunt ubi lubricum erit. Tempestas magis hiemalis fit. Plures nives ex media hac septimana erunt et viae lubricae fiant. Nostrae vivae tabulae situm in regione tua monstrant.

en: Cold season: Prepare the garden for winter: This is how your plants survive frost, ice and snow. Not only plants, but also garden furniture suffer in winter. If you don't want to experience any unpleasant surprises in spring, you should winterize your garden as soon as possible.
la: Frigidum tempus: parate paradisum hyeme: sic plantae tuae supersunt pruinae, gelu et nivis. Non solum plantae, sed etiam hortus supellectile hieme laborant. Si non vis aliquas molestias incommodas experiri in vere, hortum tuum quam primum hiemabo.

en: Cold snap in Berlin: This is how you can help homeless people. The weather in Berlin is becoming more and more wintry. It is bitterly cold, especially at night. This poses major challenges for homeless people.
la: Frigida disrumpens in Berlin: Sic homines profugos adiuvare potes. Tempestas Berolinensi magis magisque hiemalis fit. Perfrigidum est, praesertim noctu. Hoc movet provocationes maiores pro profugo populo.
